root.name: Tao's Adventure: Curse of the Demon Seal
root.description: StoryThis game revolves around a boy named Tao. Tao must enter the monster tower and find a rare egg because the people of his village where turned to stone by the monsters that flooded out of the Monster tower when the seal was broke.This game is consider a sequel to Azure Dreams.CharactersTao The main character that you get to play as. He seeks to free the people of his village who have been turned to stone.
